frontMatter.title: Harnessing AWS IAM and Terraform for Enhanced Cybersecurity
frontMatter.summary: Explore how to strengthen your cloud security by effectively managing AWS IAM components (users, policies, groups and roles) using Terraform, a powerful Infrastructure as Code tool.

prev.title: Terraform and Cybersecurity: A Chill Intro
